DOC.criteria: 18 year old Informed consent understood sign Will comply posttreatment followup requirement 5 year Candidate Powerlink Infrarenal Bifurcated Graft Life expectancy < 2 year Participating another clinical research study Pregnant lactate woman Patient medical psychiatric problem , opinion Investigator , preclude participate Study Creatinine level > 1.7mg/dl Renal transplant patient Patient > 75 % renal artery stenosis eligible PTA/stent intervention prior suprarenal device fixation
